about_the_game:
Welcome to Cuub! A game about bringing your creative Platformer ideas to life!

Jump, Place, and parkour your way through infinite levels as you let your imagination run wild!


Use the game's "Level Editor" to:

- Place blocks
- Delete blocks
- Rotate, move, and scale blocks
- Take level thumbnail screenshots


Share and download levels to enjoy! From challenges to puzzles to adventures - there's levels for everyone!
You can play tons of different themed levels, such as:

- Speedruns
- Puzzles
- Skill challenges
- Fun
- Troll (Yes that's a category)

Unlock tons of Achievements!

One of the best feelings in gaming is climbing your way up the ladder earning different achievements as you go, they're a sign of your progress!
That's no different here in Cuub - the game features tons of achievements, unlocks and goodies for you to earn as you play through it!

Online levels!

Cuub utilises the Steam Workshop to allow uploading your levels for anyone to play! All done from in game with ease! You can use the search menu in game to find levels that will interest you. Use thumbnails taken in the level editor to display a preview image of your creations!

What's that? A story mode is in development?!

Yep! that's right. I am working on a story mode for Cuub which will tie in with the level editor, most likely serving as the main part of the game. I will reveal more details about it in the future, don't worry though - my main priority is the game's level editor.

Acessibility features

The game will feature ease-of-access features such as a photosensitive mode, for people who are sensitive to flashing lights. Cuub will not have much dialogue, as to make it easier for people to understand without needing to read lots of text.
detailed_description:
Steam Workshop

This game used the steam workshop to allow custom online level uploading and downloading.


Photosensative Support

This game has a mode for people with epilepsy that reduces flashing images.


About the Game

Welcome to Cuub! A game about bringing your creative Platformer ideas to life!

Jump, Place, and parkour your way through infinite levels as you let your imagination run wild!


Use the game's "Level Editor" to:

- Place blocks
- Delete blocks
- Rotate, move, and scale blocks
- Take level thumbnail screenshots


Share and download levels to enjoy! From challenges to puzzles to adventures - there's levels for everyone!
You can play tons of different themed levels, such as:

- Speedruns
- Puzzles
- Skill challenges
- Fun
- Troll (Yes that's a category)

Unlock tons of Achievements!

One of the best feelings in gaming is climbing your way up the ladder earning different achievements as you go, they're a sign of your progress!
That's no different here in Cuub - the game features tons of achievements, unlocks and goodies for you to earn as you play through it!

Online levels!

Cuub utilises the Steam Workshop to allow uploading your levels for anyone to play! All done from in game with ease! You can use the search menu in game to find levels that will interest you. Use thumbnails taken in the level editor to display a preview image of your creations!

What's that? A story mode is in development?!

Yep! that's right. I am working on a story mode for Cuub which will tie in with the level editor, most likely serving as the main part of the game. I will reveal more details about it in the future, don't worry though - my main priority is the game's level editor.

Acessibility features

The game will feature ease-of-access features such as a photosensitive mode, for people who are sensitive to flashing lights. Cuub will not have much dialogue, as to make it easier for people to understand without needing to read lots of text.
name: Cuub

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Low end Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Low - Mid end Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements are estimations and will be updated in the future.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Low end Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Low - Mid end Graphics
  • Additional Notes: Requirements are estimations and will be updated in the future.

short_description: Platformer Game where you create your own levels and publish them for others to play while earning stats, achievements, cosmetics, collectibles and more items for you to use. As well as a campaign mode!
